Text: It's the front door to your apartment.
Would've been nice to go out tonight.
You haven't seen your friends in forever.
That's mostly your fault, though. When you moved away, you didn't make any effort to reach out to them.
They didn't either, but still. Unless you tried and they ignored you there was [i]something[/i] you could've done.
Whatever. It doesn't matter now anyways. It's not like you'd have the time to hang out with anyone even if they invited you.
